get.description: Get all boards that the authenticated user owns or has access to

post.description: Create a new Kanban board for the authenticated user

get.description: Get a specific board by its ID if the authenticated user has access

put.description: Update a board's title and/or description if the authenticated user has permission

400.description: Invalid request or board ID format

get.description: Retrieves all columns for the specified board, sorted by position
get.summary: Get all columns for a board

post.description: Changes the order of columns on a board

get.description: Get all labels for a specific board
Get list of users with access to board (owner or at least viewer)

post.description: Share board access with another user by email (owner only)

delete.description: Remove board access from user (owner only)

post.description: Creates a new column on a board

get.description: Retrieves a column by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a column by its ID

get.description: Retrieves all tasks for a specific column

200.description: List of tasks in the column

post.description: Create a new label for a board

get.description: Get a specific label by its ID
Get all tasks that have a specific label

post.description: Log in with email and password to receive an authentication token

get.description: Get list of boards shared with current user

post.description: Create a new user account and return authentication token

201.description: User created successfully with auth token

409.description: User with this email already exists

post.description: Creates a new task with the given details

get.description: Retrieves a task by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing task with new details

400.description: Invalid request or task ID format

delete.description: Deletes a task by its ID

post.description: Assigns a user to a specific task

400.description: Invalid request or task ID format

delete.description: Removes the assigned user from a task

post.description: Sets or updates the due date for a task

400.description: Invalid request or task ID format

get.description: Retrieves all labels associated with a specific task

200.description: List of labels associated with the task

post.description: Adds a label to a specific task

400.description: Invalid task or label ID format

delete.description: Removes a label from a specific task

400.description: Invalid task or label ID format

post.description: Moves a task to a different column and/or position

400.description: Invalid request or task ID format

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
